name: A Slimy Situation (Shakts)
description:
After being defeated by a group of adventurers, a slime regrets his life choices and decided to go back to his peaceful hometown. The journey back home might not be an easy one, but with the power to transform into vapor, ice, and even plasma, getting back home is just a matter of time and skill!

How to play :

  • Use directional button to move.
  • Use space / up button to jump.
  • Take advantage of your environments to transform and bypass any obstacle.
